q: co-founder Larry Page will take over as Google's CEO, while Eric Schmidt will take on the role of executive chairman, the href="http://investor.google.com/earnings/2010/Q4_google_earnings.html" title="company just announced"> company just announced. Google says it's making the changes to streamline decision making and create clearer lines of responsibility at the top of the company but there were no signs that anything was amiss at the triumvirate that has led the company since 2001. The news came as part of the company's Q4 href="http://paidcontent.org/article/419-googles-q4-numbers-give-no-hint-at-reason-for-shakeup/" title="earnings results"> earnings results.
